comment: Given a sequence of reals, it converges to a real number ` A ` w.r.t. the standard topology on the reals, if and only if it converges to ` A ` w.r.t. to the standard topology on the extended reals (see ~ climreeq ). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)
